parameters.name: updated_at
parameters.description: Date of most recent update of Item

stage_id.description: ID of the Stage of the Deal

lead_id.description: ID of Lead used to create Deal

custom_fields.description: Custom Fields in object format: Key = custom field name, Value = custom field value

deal_members.description: If both user ID and email are present, system will choose User ID

post.description:
Headers

          Accept: application/vnd.boostr.public

          Example of Request

          {
            "deal": {
              "name": "Deal" (required),
              "type": "Type",
              "source": "Source",
              "next_steps": "Next Steps",
              "start_date": "2019-01-01" (required),
              "end_date": "2019-02-01" (required),
              "stage_id": 1 (required),
              "budget": 1000,
              "budget_loc": 1000,
              "currency": "USD",
              "lead_id": 1,
              "advertiser_id": 2 (required),
              "agency_id": 3 (required if Validation is TRUE),
              "custom_fields": {
                "custom": "custom_value"
              },
              "deal_members": [{"id": 1,
                                "email": "member1@email.com",
                                "share": 100,
                                "type": "Type of User"}],
              "deal_contacts": [{"id": "id of contact",
                                 "name": "name of contact",
                                 "email": "email of contacts address",
                                 "position": "position",
                                 "role": "role" }],
              "integrations_attributes": [
                {
                  "external_type": "operative",
                  "external_id": 3333
                }
              ]
            }
          }

Headers

          Accept: application/vnd.boostr.public

          {

              "next_steps": "Next Steps",
              "start_date": "2019-01-01",
              "end_date": "2019-02-01",

              "budget": 1000,
              "budget_loc": 1000,
              "currency": "USD",
              "lead_id": 1,
              "advertiser_id": 2 (required),
              "agency_id": 3 (required if Validation is TRUE),
              "custom_fields": {
                "custom": "custom_value"
              },
              "integrations_attributes": [
                {
                  "id": 1,
                  "external_id": 3423,
                  "external_type": "operative"
                }
              ],
             "deal_members": [{"id": 1,
                                "email": "member1@email.com",
                                "share": 100,
                                "type": "Type of User"}],
              "deal_contacts": [{"id": "id of contact",
                                 "name": "name of contact",
                                 "email": "email of contacts address",
                                 "position": "position",

            }
          }

post.summary: Create a single Display Line Item

line_number.description: Numeric ID of the line in the external system

ad_server.description: Name of the delivery system for the line

product_name.description: Name of the Boostr Product for the line

price.description: Rate for the line in CPM

line_quantity.description: Total units booked for the line for the full flight

line_quantity_delivered.description: Total units delivered for the line for the full flght

line_budget_loc.description: Total booked budget for the line in local currency for the full flight

line_budget.description: Total booked budget for the line in USD for the full flight

line_budget_delivered_loc.description: Total budget delivered for the line in local currency for the full flight

line_budget_delivered.description: Total budget delivered for the line in USD for the full flight

post.description:
Headers

          Accept: application/vnd.boostr.public

          Example of Request

          {"display_line_item":
            {
              "line_number": "value",
              "ad_server": "value",
              "product_name": "full name of product" (required),
              "price": 1.2,
              "pricing_type": "CPM",
              "start_date": "2019-01-01" (required),
              "end_date": "2019-02-01" (required),
              "line_quantity": 10000 (required),
              "line_quantity_delivered": 100,
              "line_budget_loc": 100,
              "line_budget": 100,
              "line_budget_delivered_loc": 100 (required),
              "line_budget_delivered": 100,
              "is_pg": true,
              "monthly_budgets": [
                {
                  "month": "2019-01",
                  "budget_delivered": 1,
                  "budget_delivered_loc": 1,
                  "quantity_delivered": 1
                },
                {
                  "month": "2019-02",
                  "budget_delivered": 1,
                  "budget_delivered_loc": 1,
                  "quantity_delivered": 1
                }
              ] (must include all months)
            }
          }

get.summary: Get a paginated list of Media Plans

parameters.name: created_at
parameters.description: filter media plans by created date value (to setup condition use created_at_condition param)

parameters.name: created_at_condition
parameters.description: filter media plans by created date condition <, >, <=, >=, = (for define value use :created_at)

parameters.name: updated_at
parameters.description: filter media plans by updated date value (to setup condition use updated_at_condition param)

parameters.name: updated_at_condition
parameters.description: filter media plans by updated date condition <, >, <=, >=, = (for define value use :updated_at)

parameters.name: created_at_start
parameters.description: filter media plans by range created_at_start..created_at_end

parameters.name: created_at_end
parameters.description: filter media plans by range created_at_start..created_at_end

parameters.name: updated_at_start
parameters.description: filter media plans by range updated_at_start..updated_at_end

parameters.name: updated_at_end
parameters.description: filter media plans by range updated_at_start..updated_at_end

post.summary: Create a single Media Plan Line Item

available_units.description: Available Units of the line item

start_date.description: Start Date of the line item

end_date.description: End Date of the line item

media_plan_package_id.description: Name of the package the media plan line item belongs to (if any)

product_id.description: ID of the Product for the line item

budget.description: Budget of the line item in USD

budget_loc.description: Budget of the line item in local currency

rate.description: Rate of the line item in USD

rate_loc.description: Rate of the line item in local currency

quantity.description: Quantity expected for the line item

rate_type_name.description: Name of the rate type of the line item

is_added_value.description: Boolean for added value status for this line item for this media plan

est_cost.description: Estimated cost of the line item

est_cost_loc.description: Estimated cost of the line item in local currency

margin.description: Margin % of the line item in integer

post.description:
Headers

          Accept: application/vnd.boostr.public

          Example of Request

          {"line_item":
            {
              "name": "test",
              "available_units": 100,
              "start_date": "2018-11-20",
              "end_date": "2018-11-22",
              "media_plan_package_id": 76,
              "product_id": 1760,
              "budget": 11,
              "budget_loc": 2,
              "rate": 3,
              "rate_loc": 4,
              "quantity": 1,
              "rate_type_name": "CPC",
              "is_added_value": 1,
              "est_cost": 123,
              "est_cost_loc": 777,
              "margin": 3,

get.summary: Get collection of Line Item of Media Plan

parameters.name: updated_at
parameters.description: Date of most recent update of Item

get.summary: Get a single Line Item of Media Plan

put.summary: Update a single Media Plan Line Item

available_units.description: Available Units of the line item

start_date.description: Start Date of the line item

end_date.description: End Date of the line item

media_plan_package_id.description: Name of the package the media plan line item belongs to (if any)

product_id.description: ID of the Product for the line item

budget.description: Budget of the line item in USD

budget_loc.description: Budget of the line item in local currency

rate.description: Rate of the line item in USD

rate_loc.description: Rate of the line item in local currency

quantity.description: Quantity expected for the line item

rate_type_name.description: Name of the rate type of the line item

is_added_value.description: Boolean for added value status for this line item for this media plan

est_cost.description: Estimated cost of the line item

est_cost_loc.description: Estimated cost of the line item in local currency

margin.description: Margin % of the line item in integer

put.description:
Headers

          Accept: application/vnd.boostr.public

          Example of Request

          {"line_item":
            {
              "name": "test",
              "available_units": 100,
              "start_date": "2018-11-20",
              "end_date": "2018-11-22",
              "media_plan_package_id": 76,
              "product_id": 1760,
              "budget": 11,
              "budget_loc": 2,
              "rate": 3,
              "rate_loc": 4,
              "rate_type_id": 1,
              "quantity": 1,
              "rate_type_name": "CPC",
              "is_added_value": 1,
              "est_cost": 123,
              "est_cost_loc": 777,
              "margin": 3,
              "cost_adjustment": 10,
              "custom_fields": { "label": "value", "label2": "value2" },
              "quantity_type": "Impressions"
            }
          }

422.description: when custom fields with datetime type are invalid

Headers

          Accept: application/vnd.boostr.public

          Example of Request

           {"media_plan":
             {
               "owner_id": 2,

               "budget_goal_loc": 400,
               "start_date": "2019-01-01",
               "end_date": "2019-12-31",
               "margin": 100,
               "status": "status",
               "is_primary": true,
               "is_current": false,
               "is_locked": true,
               "rate_card_id": 3,
               "cost": 1,
               "cost_loc": 400,
               "created_by": 76,
               "updated_by": 76
             }
          }

post.description:
Headers

          Accept: application/vnd.boostr.public

          Example of Request

           {"pmp":
            {
              "start_date": "2020-01-01" (required),
              "end_date": "2021-01-01" (required),
              "name": "Segmant" (required),
              "deal_id": 1,
              "advertiser_id": 2 (required),
              "agency_id": 3,
              "currency": 'USD',
              "pmp_members_attributes": [
                { email: "1@2.com",
                  share: 50,
                  from_date: '2020-01-01',
                  to_date: '2021-01-01'
                }
              ]
            }
          }

Headers

put.summary: Update a single Inventory Item Period

post.description:
Headers

        Accept: application/vnd.boostr.public

        Example of Request
        {
          "items": [
            {
              "name": "Inventory Item Name",
              "description": "Description",
              "color": "#a880ff",
              "active": true,
              "time_period_increment": "day",
              "time_period_schedule_type": "per_period",
              "max_consecutive_periods_per_deal": 2,
              "categories_attributes": [ {"id": 1, "name": "DMA"}, {"id": 2, "name": "Demographics"} ],
              "product_attributes": [ {"id": 1}, {"id": 2 } ]
            }
          ]
        }

Headers

          "color": "#a880ff",
          "active": true,
          "time_period_increment": "day",
	        "time_period_schedule_type": "per_period",
